description: These kaomojis are flailing their arms about with craziness, as is standard practice for any crazy person. Right? There are so many different arms to achieve this flailing arm look (which looks so good on you, by the way). You can use characters like ヾ, ﾉﾞ,ヘ, \, / , or even grabby arms like ლ.
